name: .ABU File Extension
summary: Learn about .ABU files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Backup file created by App Backup, an app utility for Asus mobile devices used to backup apps and their data; may contain only data from an application, such as a game record, or data and the application; also includes password protection set by the user.

content: App Backup can be used to create ABU backup files and restore them as well. If you choose to only backup data, the ABU file will be a manageable size. However, if you choose to include data and the app, the ABU file will be a larger more unmanageable size.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
